summary: The client requested to initiate Sprint Planning SP-001, and Mike confirmed no issues with the included user stories (US-010, US-001, US-015), estimating a quick 20-minute execution and readiness to proceed.

decisions.title: Proceed with Sprint Planning SP-001
decisions.details: Sprint includes foundational user stories with no major dependencies or red flags; all testable with Supabase and basic UI.

actions.task: Kick off Sprint Planning SP-001 upon confirmation
